SESSION_ID.description: Session ID gotten from pair web: https://kord.live/session

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner number of user with country code

PREFIX.description: Use format: [.!?] for multiple and . for default

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Makes the bot mark account online always

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB URL for economy commands, without it economy commands won't work

SAVE_STATUS.description: Automatically send status updates to owner

ERROR_MSG.description: Send error to owner when command fails

TIMEZONE.description: Set time zone for menu, cron jobs

STICKER_AUTHOR.description: Author name shown in sticker info

OWNER_NAME.description: Display name of the bot owner

RENDER_API_KEY.description: Set if you're deploying on Render

ANTIDELETE.description: Sends deleted message to owner's DM

ANTIDELETE_INCHAT.description: Sends deleted message to the same chat it was deleted

AUDIO_DATA.description: Audio data for take command, syntax: Kord;Bot

SUDO.description: Number of allowed users if bot is private, syntax: 2341234567;234654321

MODS.description: Number of allowed owners if bot is private or not, same syntax as sudo

LANG_CODE.description: Language code for translate command and some other features

VV_CMD.description: Emoji to automatically send replied viewOnce to owner

RES_TYPE.description: How bot responds in some commands, use text/poll
